items.title: Trump to meet Venezuelan opposition leader Machado at the White House
items.title_zh: 特朗普在白宫会见委内瑞拉反对派领袖马查多
items.summary: Venezuelan opposition leader and Nobel Peace Prize winner María Corina Machado will meet President Donald Trump on Thursday, the White House has confirmed.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉反对派领袖和诺贝尔和平奖得主玛丽亚·科琳娜·马查多将在星期四会见总统唐纳德·特朗普,白宫已经确认.

items.summary_zh: 特朗普总统“绿地防御强化双狗雪橇”

items.title: 'They just kept killing': Eyewitnesses describe deadly crackdown in Iran
items.title_zh: "他们一直在杀人": 目击者描述伊朗的致命镇压
items.summary: "I saw it with my own eyes - they fired directly into lines of protesters, and people fell where they stood."
items.summary_zh: "我亲眼目睹——他们直接射入抗议者一行,人们倒地而下".

items.title: 山梨 山林火災 鎮火のめど立たず“住宅に燃え移る危険性低い”
items.title_zh: Yamanashi Yamayashi大火“烧入房屋的风险较小”
items.summary: 衆院解散へ動きが活発に 高市首相 外交日程など踏まえ最終判断
items.summary_zh: 高一首相最后决定基于"方略"时间表等.

items.title: 'Miracle baby' born in a tree above Mozambique floodwaters dies aged 25
items.title_zh: 在莫桑比克洪水上方一棵树上出生的“奇迹宝宝”25岁死亡
items.summary: She was seen as a "miracle baby" after being born in a tree which her mother had climbed to escape flooding, but nearly 26 years on Mozambican Rosita Salvador Mabuiango has died after a long illness, her sister told the BBC.
items.summary_zh: 她在母亲为躲避洪水而爬上一棵树后被看做是"奇迹宝宝",但在莫桑比克的罗西塔·萨尔瓦多·马比安戈(英语:Rosita Salvador Mabuiango)上,近26年在长病后去世,她妹妹告诉了英国广播公司.

items.title: Former Fed chairs condemn criminal investigation into Jerome Powell
items.title_zh: 前联邦主席谴责对杰罗姆·鲍威尔的刑事调查
items.summary: Three former heads of the US central bank on Monday strongly criticised a criminal investigation into chair Jerome Powell, describing it as a bid to undermine the Federal Reserve's independence.
items.summary_zh: 美国央行三位前行长星期一强烈批评了对杰罗姆·鲍威尔主席的刑事调查,形容这是企图破坏美联储的独立性.

items.title: Mortuary videos show how deadly Iran crackdown has become
items.title_zh: 迫击炮视频显示伊朗的镇压已变得多么致命。
items.summary: Anti-government protests have swept through major cities and towns across Iran, and the authorities are responding with a harsh crackdown.
items.summary_zh: 反政府抗议席卷了伊朗各地的大城市,当局正以严厉的镇压来回应.

items.title: What we know about Iran's protests and the crackdown
items.title_zh: 关于伊朗的抗议和镇压,
items.summary: Anti-government protests have been rocking Iran for the past two weeks, with hundreds though to have been killed as the regime cracks down on its opponents.
items.summary_zh: 反政府抗议活动在过去两周中不断震撼伊朗,

items.title: 衆院解散へ動きが活発に 高市首相 外交日程など踏まえ最終判断
items.title_zh: 高一首相最后决定基于"方略"时间表等.
items.summary: 国民 玉木代表 予算案の年度内成立困難なら「経済後回し解散」
items.summary_zh: 国家玉木代表 如果难以在预算计划"经济解体后"的QQ年内确定.

items.title: Hungary grants asylum to Polish ex-justice minister
items.title_zh: 匈牙利向波兰前司法部长提供庇护
items.summary: Hungary has granted political asylum to Poland's former Justice Minister Zbigniew Ziobro who is facing charges of embezzlement.
items.summary_zh: 匈牙利向波兰前司法部长兹比格涅夫·齐奥布罗提供了政治庇护,他正面临贪污的指控。

items.title: Jailed Venezuelan politician's son says Trump shouldn't be 'fooled' by pledge of prisoner releases
items.title_zh: 被囚禁的委内瑞拉政治家的儿子说特朗普不应该因为保证释放囚犯而被"愚弄".
items.summary: The son of a jailed Venezuelan opposition leader has warned Donald Trump to "not be fooled" by the country's government, amid accusations it has not kept its promise to release a significant number of political prisoners.
items.summary_zh: 一名被监禁的委内瑞拉反对派领袖之子曾警告唐纳德·特朗普"不被政府所愚弄",在指责下,政府没有兑现释放大量政治犯的承诺.

items.title: Custody extended for owner of Swiss ski bar after deadly fire
items.title_zh: 致命火灾后,瑞士滑雪酒吧老板的监护权延长
items.summary: A judge in Switzerland has ordered that one of the two co-owners of the ski resort bar where 40 people died in a fire on New Year's Eve be kept in detention for 90 days.
items.summary_zh: 瑞士一名法官下令将滑雪胜地酒吧的两名共有者之一拘留90天,那里有40人在除夕夜的火灾中死亡.

items.title: Five severed heads displayed on Ecuador beach
items.title_zh: 在厄瓜多尔海滩展出5个被砍头的头
items.summary: Bathers found five severed heads displayed on a beach in Ecuador in what appears to be a warning to gang members who have been threatening local fishermen.
items.summary_zh: 巴瑟斯在厄瓜多尔海滩上发现了五个被砍断的头颅,

items.title: Referee and student among hundreds killed in Iran protests
items.title_zh: 在伊朗抗议活动中被杀害的数百人中的被告和学生
items.summary: A referee and a student are among hundreds of people reportedly killed during massive anti-government protests in Iran.
items.summary_zh: 据报道,在伊朗大规模反政府抗议活动中,数百人中有一名裁判和一名学生被杀害。

items.title: Nigerian stars dominate All Africa Music Awards
items.title_zh: 尼日利亚明星主宰全非音乐奖
items.summary: Nigerian artists secured a string of victories at the 9th All Africa Music Awards (Afrima), which concluded in Lagos on Sunday night.
items.summary_zh: 尼日利亚艺术家在第9届全非音乐奖(Afrima)上获得一连串胜利,

items.title: Monkeys on the loose in St Louis after four-day search
items.title_zh: 在圣路易斯搜了四天后 猴子们在逃
items.summary: Multiple monkeys are on the loose in St Louis, Missouri, sparking confusion and concern from the city's animal control officials, who said they do not know where the primates came from.
items.summary_zh: 密苏里州圣路易斯有多只猴子在逃,引发了城市动物管制官员的混乱和担忧,他们表示不知道灵长类动物来自何处.

items.title: Watch: Moment skier and dog swept along by avalanche
items.title_zh: 看:滑雪运动员和狗被雪崩卷走
items.summary: Footage recorded by Spanish skier Ares Masip showed the moment she was swept by an avalanche in Pic de l'Hortell, a mountain in the Pyrenees in Andorra.
items.summary_zh: 西班牙滑雪运动员阿雷斯·马西普所记录的足迹显示了她在安道尔比利牛斯山地Pic de l'Hortell被雪崩所席卷的一瞬间.

items.title: He once criticised African leaders who cling to power. Now he wants a seventh term
items.title_zh: 他曾经批评坚持执政的非洲领导人。 现在他想要一个第七学期
items.summary: Ugandans under the age of 40 - and that is more than three-quarters of the population - have only known one president.
items.summary_zh: 40岁以下的乌干达人——占人口的四分之三以上——只认识一名总统。

items.title: Thousands of tourists stranded in Lapland as cold grounds flights
items.title_zh: 数以千计的游客被滞留在拉普兰作为冷地飞行
items.summary: Thousands of tourists have been stranded in Finland's Lapland as a severe cold spell has grounded flights out of one of its airports.
items.summary_zh: 数以千计的游客被困在芬兰的拉普兰,

items.title: Are You Dead?: The viral Chinese app for young people living alone
items.title_zh: 你死了吗? 病毒中国应用程序 年轻人独居
items.summary: A new bleak-sounding app has taken China by storm.
items.summary_zh: 新发"忧郁"的应用 被暴风雨吞噬了中国.

items.title: Ai, Japanese chimpanzee who counted and painted, dies at 49
items.title_zh: 爱 有日本黑猩猩 数到四十九就死了
items.summary: Ai, a female chimpanzee famous for her cognitive skills has died at 49, according to the Japanese institute where she lived.
items.summary_zh: 爱 根据她所住的日本研究所,一位以认知能力出名的女性黑猩猩已死亡49岁.

items.title: Watch: Timothée Chalamet, Teyana Taylor, Adolescence and other highlights from the Golden Globes
items.title_zh: 观察:蒂莫泰·查拉梅特,泰亚娜·泰勒,青少年等出自"金球会"的要闻.
items.summary: The biggest names in film and TV gathered to officially kick off Hollywood's awards season at the 83rd Golden Globe Awards, hosted by comedian Nikki Glaser in California.
items.summary_zh: 第83届金球奖颁奖典礼上,由喜剧演员尼基·格拉泽(Nikki Glaser)在加利福尼亚州主持,电影和电视上最大的名字聚集一堂,正式踢出好莱坞的颁奖季.

items.title: Chalamet beats DiCaprio to Golden Globes glory
items.title_zh: 查拉梅特击败迪卡普里奥夺得金球奖
items.summary: Timothée Chalamet was among the main winners as Hollywood's finest gathered for this year's Golden Globe Awards.
items.summary_zh: Timothée Chalamet是好莱坞年度金球奖最佳获奖者之一。

items.title: Meta blocks 550,000 accounts under Australia's social media ban
items.title_zh: Meta块55万个账户,
items.summary: About 550,000 accounts were blocked by Meta during the first days of Australia's landmark social media ban for kids.
items.summary_zh: 大约55万个账户在澳洲标志性社交媒体禁止孩子的第一天被Meta封锁.

items.title: More federal agents to be sent to Minnesota, Trump administration says
items.title_zh: 特朗普政府表示,
items.summary: The Trump administration has said it will send "hundreds more" federal officers to Minneapolis, days after the death of a woman who was shot by a US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) agent in the city.
items.summary_zh: 特朗普政府表示将派出"再上百"的联邦官员去明尼阿波利斯,几天后,一名被美国移民与海关执法局(ICE)在市内特工所枪杀的妇女被枪杀.

items.title: Sudan's government returns to capital after nearly 3 years of war
items.title_zh: 苏丹政府在近三年战争后恢复首都
items.summary: Sudan's military-led government has returned to the country's capital after nearly three years of operating from its wartime base in the eastern city of Port Sudan.
items.summary_zh: 苏丹由军方领导的政府从苏丹港东城的战时基地运作了近三年后已返回了苏丹首都.

items.title: Trump tells Cuba to 'make a deal, before it is too late'
items.title_zh: 特朗普告诉古巴"在为时已晚之前做个交易".
items.summary: Donald Trump has urged Cuba to "make a deal" or face consequences, warning that the flow of Venezuelan oil and money would now stop.
items.summary_zh: 唐纳德·特朗普已敦促古巴"做个交易"或面临后果,警告委内瑞拉石油和货币的流动现在会停止.

items.title: One person dead and 300 buildings destroyed in Australia bushfires
items.title_zh: 澳大利亚丛林大火造成一人死亡和300所建筑物被摧毁
items.summary: One person has died and 300 properties have been destroyed in bushfires that have torn across south-east Australia.
items.summary_zh: 在横跨澳大利亚东南部的丛林大火中,1人死亡,300个财产被摧毁。

items.title: Bride and groom killed by gas explosion day after Pakistan wedding
items.title_zh: 新娘和新郎在巴基斯坦婚礼后一天被毒气炸死
items.summary: A newly married couple were killed when a gas cylinder exploded at a house in Islamabad where they were sleeping after their wedding party, police have said.
items.summary_zh: 警察说,在伊斯兰堡的一所房子里,一对新婚夫妇在婚礼后睡觉时被一个气瓶所爆炸而身亡。

items.title: Last Kurdish forces leave Aleppo after ceasefire deal reached
items.title_zh: 在达成停火协议后最后一批库尔德部队离开阿勒颇
items.summary: The final Kurdish fighters have withdrawn from the Syrian city of Aleppo, after the announcement of a ceasefire deal in the early hours of Sunday morning.
items.summary_zh: 在星期天凌晨宣布停火协议后,最后的库尔德战士已经从叙利亚城市阿勒颇撤出.

items.title: Bob Weir, Grateful Dead co-founder, dies aged 78
items.title_zh: Bob Weir, 感恩而死共同创始人,死于78岁
items.summary: Bob Weir, the guitarist who co-founded the Grateful Dead, has died aged 78.
items.summary_zh: 吉他手鲍勃·韦尔(Bob Weir)共同创立了"感恩之死",已经去世了78岁.

items.title: 'I had no electricity for six months': US families struggle with soaring energy prices
items.title_zh: 美国家庭为能源价格飙升而挣扎,
items.summary: Kristy Hallowell had just lost her job when her energy bill unexpectedly tripled to $1,800 (£1,340) a month.
items.summary_zh: 克丽丝蒂·哈洛威尔刚刚失业,当时她的能源账单意外地增加了两倍,达到每月1800美元(1,340英镑).

items.title: US military strikes Islamic State group targets in Syria, officials say
items.title_zh: 美国军方打击叙利亚的伊斯兰国集团目标,
items.summary: The US and its partner forces have carried out large-scale strikes against Islamic State (IS) group targets in Syria, the US Central Command (Centcom) has announced.
items.summary_zh: 美国及其伙伴部队对叙利亚境内的"伊斯兰国"(IS)团体目标进行了大规模打击,美国中央司令部(Centcom)宣布.

items.title: Five hundred people in Canada were diagnosed with mystery brain disease. What if it isn't real?
items.title_zh: 加拿大有500人被诊断出有神秘脑病. 如果这不是真的呢?
items.summary: Five hundred people in a small Canadian province were diagnosed with a mystery brain disease. What would it mean for the patients if the disease was never real?
items.summary_zh: 加拿大一个小省份有500人被诊断出患有神秘脑病. 如果疾病永远不是真实的,这对病人意味着什么?

items.title: 'Hermès of durian': The luxury fruit cashing in on China's billion-dollar appetite
items.title_zh: "榴花骑士": 奢侈果实让中国十亿元的胃口
items.summary: Driving around Raub, a small town in Malaysia, it's impossible to miss the prickly fruit that powers its economy.
items.summary_zh: 在马来西亚小镇Raub附近开车,

items.title: Author Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie's family accuse hospital of negligence over son's death
items.title_zh: 作者Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie的家人指控医院忽视儿子的死亡
items.summary: The family of Nigerian novelist Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie has accused a hospital of negligence over the death of her 21-month-old son.
items.summary_zh: 尼日利亚小说家奇马曼达·恩戈齐·阿迪奇(Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie)的家人指控一家医院对她21个月多的儿子的死亡玩忽职守.

items.title: 'There wasn't even time for CPR': Iran medics describe hospitals overwhelmed with dead and injured protesters
items.title_zh: "连心肺复苏的时间都没有": 伊朗医护人员描述医院充满死伤抗议者。
items.summary: Staff at several hospitals in Iran have told the BBC their facilities are overwhelmed with dead or injured patients, as major anti-government protests continue.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗多家医院的工作人员向英国广播公司表示,随着重大反政府抗议的继续,他们的设施充满了死伤病人.

items.title: Rare first Superman comic once stolen from Nicolas Cage sells for $15m
items.title_zh: 稀有的第一出超人漫画 曾被偷 从尼古拉·凯奇卖出1500美元
items.summary: A rare copy of the 1938 comic that introduced Superman to the world has sold to an anonymous collector for $15m (£11.2m).
items.summary_zh: 1938年将"超人"引入世界的漫画的罕见副本已经以1500万英镑(1120万英镑)的价格卖给了一位匿名收藏家.

items.title: Watch: Backlash against Musk's Grok AI explained
items.title_zh: 观察:反对穆斯克的Grok AI解释
items.summary: The UK government says X limiting Grok AI image edits to users who pay a monthly fee is "insulting" to victims of misogyny and sexual violence.
items.summary_zh: 英国政府表示,X将Grok AI的图像编辑限制在每月付费的用户是"侮辱"厌恶女性和性暴力的受害者.

items.title: Why are there huge protests going on in Iran?
items.title_zh: 伊朗为何举行大规模抗议?
items.summary: Anti-government protests have continued in Iran for the 13th day in a row.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗连续13天持续进行反政府抗议.

items.title: 'He's crazy': BBC speaks to Greenlanders about Trump's threats
items.title_zh: "他疯了":BBC向格陵兰人讲述特朗普的威胁
items.summary: This week, Donald Trump repeated his desire to take over Greenland and make it part of the United States, potentially by using military force.
items.summary_zh: 本周,唐纳德·特朗普(Donald Trump)再次表示希望占领格陵兰并使之成为美国的一部分,可能通过使用军事力量.
